body_html: @NIEYALI I see. So to do ROCm build rocblas is a required dependency, so you need to install that. If you don't want to do ROCm build (but just happens you have partially installed ROCm before in your system), I have put up #14261 to allow disabling ROCm build with USE_ROCM=0 environment variable.
body_text: @NIEYALI I see. So to do ROCm build rocblas is a required dependency, so you need to install that. If you don't want to do ROCm build (but just happens you have partially installed ROCm before in your system), I have put up #14261 to allow disabling ROCm build with USE_ROCM=0 environment variable.
body: @NIEYALI I see. So to do ROCm build rocblas is a required dependency, so you need to install that. If you don't want to do ROCm build (but just happens you have partially installed ROCm before in your system), I have put up #14261 to allow disabling ROCm build with USE_ROCM=0 environment variable.
